Comment: Just a game i thought i would add to the annotations as an example of removing the defender.

Black trying to expell the bishop.  I dont want to run around so the exchange was accepted.  Also gets the black queen out early which is potentially good for white as you will see in a few more moves.
Black trying to threaten Nxc2 or Nxf3 and if white Qxf3 then Black Qxf3 white will have to recapture with gxf3 leaving white king exposed.
